official_title: The Use of Local Anesthetic in Intralesional Corticosteroid Injections; A Randomized, Double Blind Controlled Trial
inclusion_criteria:
* >12 years old presenting with an indication for intralesional steroid injection
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 12 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Unconsentable
* Not a candidate for corticosteroid injection
* Contraindication to lidocaine
